entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
